items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 40 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 9!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 25 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 6!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 55 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 12.
Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 25 distinct venues!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 30 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 7!

items.checkin_comment: Definently found that I like this style

items.badge_description: Thanks for stopping by and checking out our digs! We're brewer owned & operated, opened our doors in April of 2015. We put a lot of thought in to every aspect of your experience, hope you enjoy!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 35 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 8!

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 4)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 5!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 25 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 6!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 35 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 8!

Sometimes you need a break from all the hops, fruits, and spices. What better way than with a crisp, smooth Blonde Ale or Golden Ale? Basic but delicious. That's 5 different beers with the style of Blonde Ale or Golden Ale. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Everyone loves fresh beer, but obviously not as much as you do. You went straight to the source. 

That's a beer at 15 different venues categorized as a Brewery. Visit 5 more different ones for Level 4!
Cheers to eight years of checking in beers! Thank you for continuing to discover, sip, and share with us!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 20 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 5!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 5 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Right about now you’re feeling your face tighten and your taste buds explode. The full pucker is quickly setting in and you can’t get enough. This is the wonder of the sour. That's 10 different Sour Beers. Try 5 more for Level 3.

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 50 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 11.
You're getting the hang of it, but there’s much more to try. That’s over 50 unique brews!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 30 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 7!

You have a keen taste for this Belgian masterpiece. Did you know the Saison style beer was invented by Belgian farms, brewed in the Winter and served the Spring/Summer to all their workers? Well now you do! That’s 5 different Saisons, Grisettes or Sour - Farmhouse Ale, try 5 more for Level 2.

items.badge_description: First brewed in the early 16th century, this peculiar flavored beer has made quite the come back. With a tart, salty combination, your taste buds are probably still tingling... and excited for more! That's 5 different beers with the style of Gose. Try 5 more for Level 2!

items.checkin_comment: Good light beer, not as salt forward as some. Can definently taste the lime.
